title: How to Make a Sausage Sandwich

steps.headline: Prepare the ingredients.
steps.description: Run to the store and buy sausage, sausage bread, peppers, and onions then have these ingredients ready in the place you'll be making the sandwich in.

steps.headline: Cook both the onions and peppers until soft.
steps.description: Cook the peppers and the onions together in a large pan for about 15 to 20 minutes on medium heat or until the onions are translucent and the peppers are soft.

steps.headline: Cook the sausage.
steps.description: Fry the sausage for 20 minutes or according to the instructions on the package. Use a small bit of butter to grease the pan and to add flavor.

steps.headline: Let the sausage sizzle.
steps.description: Put the bread on the pan and gently push it around with a spatula so that it soaks up the excess butter making the bread nice and buttery.

steps.headline: Turn off the heat.
steps.description: Cut the sausages in half the long way and allow them to cool a bit.

steps.headline: Assemble the sandwich.
steps.description: Put the peppers, sausage, and onions into the bread.

steps.headline: Squeeze some sauce ontop.
steps.description: Choose any type of sauce you want such as mustard and add some ontop of the sausage or you can add no sauce at all.

steps.headline: Serve.
steps.description: These can be eaten with a side dish such as fries or chips if you're really hungry. Enjoy your masterpiece!
